title: bookmark button
content: After last update, my "bookmark page" button disappeared. Cannot bookmark any page now. "View" button also vanished.
creator: Bowkie

title: youypip
content: hjgfh
creator: nainobarca27

title: lost my account history, passwords, etc.
content: quit firefox on my mac, reopened it and all my account history, passwords, etc were lost. is there any way to recover them? im sure this has been asked many times, but i have been using firefox for 2 years, never had any issue. recently i quit the app on my mac, when i reopened it, absolutely everything was gone. i had a LOT of saved emails and passowords i never backed up, and i reallyyy need them back. i logged back in with the same email i had for my firefox account originally, but absolutely everything is gone, as if ive just made a new account, im just at a loss what can i do? :(
creator: izzwizzbel10

title: not sending SMPT email since update
content:
I updated Thunderbird on August 4,5, & 6. Since then I cannot send (or reply to) any email. I do receive my email. The failure is 'FAILED TO LOGIN SERVER'.

Here are the particulars to my system: john@cm26:~> sudo zypper if MozillaThunderbird Loading repository data... Reading installed packages...


Information for package MozillaThunderbird:

   Thunderbird is a free, open-source, cross-platform application for    managing email, news feeds, chat, and news groups. It is a local    (rather than browser- or web-based) email application that is powerful    yet easy to use.

title: I can't make only saved sites on the start page.
content:
I used a translator, so the names of the functions may not match.

I want the "start page" or the new firefox tab to contain only the sites that I have pinned, as it happens in any chromium browser.

I don't need junk offers from the browser history to be on the new tab in addition to the sites I've pinned.

I went to settings > start > Firefox Home Page Content

And out of everything, I have a check mark only for "shortcuts", sponsored shortcuts are disabled. BUT the description of the shortcuts function says "Saved or visited sites" That is, I can't just turn off the "suggestions"
creator: lamp4.not

title: Homeowner's quandary
content:
Problem that is beyond my -- and perhaps your -- capacity. But here goes: Do you know a reputable local company that could replace our garage door -- and overhead door lifter unit? Sears lifter motor still operates (it makes noise). when powered up. I couldn't observe from above, but although drive-chain didn't budge, the 25-year-old unit (internal lifter) sounded "okay." (Yes, as noisy as its Day 1 installation.) My guess: motor's gear is stripped (the "bike-chain" is not moving).

Please advise soonest.

Thank you, Peter McGullam 12 Cliftwood Drive Huntington NY 11743

title: Firfox versions 140 ande/or 141
content:
.I recently updated to either V140 or 141 in the past few days. It appears that there have been some MAJOR changes to Firefox. I can find but find it hard to use my old bookmarks and profiles.

Too many things changed. For some reason, I performed a "refresh" during the update. I now have a icon on my desktop labeled "old firefox data". I assume that this is the old properties file. I found the help section about restoring bookmarks, etc, but it didn't tell me how to use this file to recover my old information.

I have been a loyal user of Firefox since the early days (I believe it used to be Netscape Navigator.) This is the first time I've had any issues after an update. I would like my 'old' Firefox back.

For instance, there was a menu option to view/access my bookmarks. Click the option and I would get a nice listing of my bookmarks. I could arrange by usage. More recent sites could be listed at the top of the list. then I could then select the site to visit and everything was good to go. Not so any more. I have many sites bookmarked but the entire list is presented to me, in no particular order. I have to scroll down to find the site to be visited.

I have Window 10
creator: rlasher

title: High cpu usage dispite hardware acceleration
content:
I have the issue that despite hardware acceleration is working Firefox causes a high cpu usage which leads to the CPU is constantly boosting to high frequencies and this to higher power consumption. In about:processes of Firefox I can see that the main process is at CPU usage around 150% or higher and tabs (8 in total usually) that contain live stream video spiking up to 50%. nvtop, intel_gpu_top and LACT all indicate that hardware acceleration is working. btop shows even a CPU usage of the Firefox main process over 175%. The overall CPU usage of the system is at 60%. I couldn‚Äôt find any helpful information so far in the internet. Maybe here we can get trace of the cause. The reason is I want to bring down the power consumption. Question is is there an issue or I am facing a (hardware) limitation.

I did two traces with Firefox profiler.

Here and here are the results.

I can provide additional information and logs if needed.
creator: Erik.Schick

title: On Exit Firefox closes all open tabs
content:
As a resent change Firefox closes all my open tabs when I exit. That is not what I want. Not sure if it's an update to version 128.13.0esr(64-bit) that is the reason for this issue.

I History I have the settings: - Remember browsing and download history (activated) - Remember search and form history (activated) - Clear history when Firefox closes (deactivated)

I have activated "Confirm before closing multiple tabs" and when I exit I get a notification that Firefox will close all tabs.

Is this a bug or do I need to change a setting somewhere ?

Hmm. We‚Äôre having trouble finding that site.

title: Delete history by days right from history panel
content:
Hello. I have an issue with history panel.

In previous of Firefox the history, split by date, each day's block used to have it's own actions: it had a context menu with "Delete" item. Also it was possible to put focus on some day, press Delete button on keyboard and to get all items of this day removed from the history.

Since version 141 it is not possible.

Please get this opportunity back.

I can guess the video player app is being used in some kind of attack.

The link I clicked on. https://streamed.pk/watch/carolina-panthers-vs-cleveland-browns-2261156/admin/1

Btw I googled this and saw others complaining about it but basically no info.
